entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expand `Use pattern matching` analyzer/codefix to suggest property patterns #65613
  • `GenerateDeconstructMethodCodeFixProvider` should support positional patterns #65612
  • Prevent auto removal of spaces between brackets #65610
  • csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_as_with_null_check incorrect results near labels and goto statements #65609
  • Comments should be aligned with the text below, not above. #65608
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project.DefaultNamespace` is null for `sqlproj`. #65607

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65614
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move `DisambiguateSameVariableTests` to `VerifyCS` #65611
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Move "Unseal class" codefix to VerifyCS #65605
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
